ygData.subject: appropriate levels for Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Invis does NOT work for any quest I know of.  It drops as soon as you start, and you die before you can complete the transaction. I don t have Hide, so I
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 25 May 2000 refplace@... wrote:

> Everyone else has to rely on Hide or Invis.

Invis does NOT work for any quest I know of. It drops as soon as you
start, and you die before you can complete the transaction.

I don't have Hide, so I can't speak for that, but I thought Sneak was the
skill that allowed invisible questing and purchasing. Could be wrong
there.

> Do your Illusion and Benevolence from a distance and see how he cons.
> If he is dubious or apprehensive your probably safe to turn it in. If
> he is still Scowling ready to attack then kill more goblins or Iksar
> outcasts or Sarnak to raise your faction.

Indeed.

> I have not done this part with my enchanter yet as he is too low level to
> enjoy Kunark.

This surprises me. Kunark is a bit tough for teens and under (mostly due
to travel danger, as there are places that would be good once you get L12
and can bind), but once you're high enough level to even have
Illusion:Iksar, it's a fine place. I've been having a blast killing
goblins, sarnaks, forest giants, brutes, cacti, etc. in the Overthere,
Warslik's Woods, and Lake of Ill Omen with my L25 necro.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
